label: Princess Prep Office
description:
A filing cabinet to John's left is open.  
Files and papers are strewn about.  
The desk chair is turned upside down.
The desk itself is opened.
The plant to his right seems to be shaking, in fact, it seems to have something inside of it.

Hit 1 if you want John to check out the desk.
Hit 2 if you want John to check out the plants.
Hit 3 if you want John to check out the filing cabinet.

Hit 0 to quit.
